# myqcc

This package contains Qiskit implementations for basic quantum operations, gates, and circuits.

## Installation

```bash
pip install myqcc
```

## Usage

```python
import qc

# List available functions
qc.help()

# Run a specific quantum function
qc.hadamard_gate()
qc.circuit_formation_1()

# Run ALL functions
qc.all()
```
